name: Haven (itch) (Spydercrawler)
description:
This is our game for the indie tales jam. We had a lot of fun making this. I really think many parts of the game, especially the art and music, came out pretty well.

The theme interpretation was mostly story based, but unfortunately a bit of the dialogue is messed up for some reason in the export and I don't have time to fix it. It isn't the important dialogue though.

I hope you enjoy!
